examples.title: Color
examples.description: Background color of box and text color inside a box can be adjusted using the [Color tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/color).

examples.title: Border width
examples.description: Border width can be adjusted using the [Border tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/border), and a subset of tokens allows different types of border.

examples.title: Border radius
examples.description: Border radius can be adjusted using the [Border tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/border).

examples.title: Padding
examples.description: Padding can be added to either all sides, left, right, top, and bottom, using the [Space tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/space). The `padding` prop supports responsive spacing with the [Breakpoints tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/breakpoints).

examples.title: Shadow
examples.description: Shadow can be applied using the [Shadow tokens](https://polaris.shopify.com/tokens/shadow).

examples.title: Color

members.name: padding
members.description: Spacing around children. Accepts a spacing token or an object of spacing tokens for different screen sizes.

members.name: paddingBlockStart
members.description: Vertical start spacing around children. Accepts a spacing token or an object of spacing tokens for different screen sizes.

members.name: paddingBlockEnd
members.description: Vertical end spacing around children. Accepts a spacing token or an object of spacing tokens for different screen sizes.

members.name: paddingInlineStart
members.description: Horizontal start spacing around children. Accepts a spacing token or an object of spacing tokens for different screen sizes.

members.name: paddingInlineEnd
members.description: Horizontal end spacing around children. Accepts a spacing token or an object of spacing tokens for different screen sizes.

members.name: printHidden
members.description: Visually hide the contents during print

members.name: visuallyHidden
members.description: Visually hide the contents (still announced by screenreader)
